explains: vi. 蠕动，扭动；羞愧，不舒服

sentences.en: He gave a feeble shrug and tried to squirm free.
sentences.cn: 他微微地耸了耸肩，扭动着试图挣脱。

sentences.en: Someone grabbed him but he managed to squirm free.
sentences.cn: 有人抓住他，但他设法挣脱了。

sentences.en: It made him squirm to think how badly he'd messed up the interview.
sentences.cn: 一想到他把面试搞得有多糟，他就觉得无地自容。
